name: ratafia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small biscuit flavoured with almonds (= a type of nut that is oval in shape): She dipped a ratafia into her drink and crunched it, smiling. Sprinkle some crumbled ratafias on the cake to decorate it. Crumble the ratafia biscuits over the top of the cake. Ratafia cakes are popular, easy-to-make cookies.
